content: वरूथिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Wearing an armour, mailed. {@--2@} Furnished with a fender or protecting plank; अवतिमेकरथेन वरूथिना जितवतः किल तस्य धनुर्भृतः <ls>R. 9. 11.</ls> {@--3@} Protecting, sheltering. {@--4@} Surrounded by a troop. {@--5@} Being or seated in a carriage. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A chariot. {@--2@} A guard, defender. --नी An army; स्खलितसलिलामुल्लंध्यैनां जगाम वरुथिनी <ls>Śi. 12. 77</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 50.</ls>
